scripts.prebuild: npm run env && node ./tools/git-version.js && npm run build:packages
scripts.prepare: husky && ts-patch install && npm run plugin-api:build
scripts.buildAllElectron:noTests:prod: npm run lint && npm run buildFrontend:prod:es6 && npm run electron:build
scripts.buildAllElectron:prod: npm run env && npm run preCheck && npm run buildFrontend:prod:es6 && npm run electron:build
scripts.buildAllElectron:stage: npm run preCheck && npm run buildFrontend:stage:es6 && npm run electron:build
scripts.buildFrontend:prod:es6: npm run prebuild && cross-env BROWSERSLIST_ENV='modern' ng build --configuration production && npm run removeWOFF1
scripts.buildFrontend:prod:watch: npm run prebuild && ng build --configuration production --watch
scripts.buildFrontend:prodWeb: npm run prebuild && ng build  --configuration productionWeb
scripts.buildFrontend:stage:es6: npm run prebuild && cross-env BROWSERSLIST_ENV='modern' ng build --configuration stage && npm run removeWOFF1
scripts.buildFrontend:stageWeb: npm run prebuild && ng build --configuration stageWeb
scripts.buildFrontend:stageWeb:unminified: npm run prebuild && ng build --configuration stageWeb --optimization=false --aot=false
scripts.dist:android: npm run buildFrontend:stageWeb:unminified && npm run sync:android && npm run assemble:android:stage && echo 'Staging Android APK generated at android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/'
scripts.dist:android:prod: npm run buildFrontend:prodWeb && npm run sync:android && npm run assemble:android:prod && echo 'Production Android APK generated at android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/'
scripts.dist:win:store: git pull && npm run && copy electron-builder.win-store.yaml electron-builder.yaml && npm run dist:win && git checkout electron-builder.yaml || git checkout electron-builder.yaml
scripts.droid: npm run buildFrontend:stageWeb:unminified && npx cap sync
scripts.e2e:webdav: docker compose up -d webdav && ./scripts/wait-for-webdav.sh && npm run e2e -- --grep webdav; docker compose down
scripts.install:android: adb install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/fdroid/debug/app-fdroid-debug.apk && echo 'Staging APK installed successfully.'
scripts.install:android:prod: adb install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/fdroid/release/app-fdroid-release.apk && echo 'Production APK installed successfully.'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:scss
scripts.localInstall: sudo echo 'Starting local install' && rm -Rf ./.tmp/angular-dist/ && rm -Rf ./.tmp/app-builds/ && npm run buildAllElectron:stage && electron-builder --linux deb && sudo dpkg -i .tmp/app-builds/superProductivity*.deb
scripts.localInstall:mac: sudo echo 'Starting local install MAC. Don`t forget APPLEID & APPLEIDPASS !!' && npm run buildAllElectron:noTests:prod && sudo echo '' && electron-builder && sudo cp -rf .tmp/app-builds/mac/superProductivity.app/ /Applications/superProductivity.app
scripts.localInstall:prod: sudo echo 'Starting local install PROD' && rm -Rf ./.tmp/angular-dist/ && rm -Rf ./.tmp/app-builds/ && npm run buildAllElectron:prod && electron-builder --linux deb && sudo dpkg -i .tmp/app-builds/superProductivity*.deb
scripts.localInstall:quick: sudo echo 'Starting local install QUICK' && rm -Rf ./.tmp/angular-dist/ && rm -Rf ./.tmp/app-builds/ && npm run buildFrontend:stage:es6 && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --linux deb && sudo dpkg -i .tmp/app-builds/superProductivity*.deb
scripts.localInstall:test:snap: sudo echo 'Starting local install SNAP QUICK' && rm -Rf ./.tmp/angular-dist/ && rm -Rf ./.tmp/app-builds/ && npm run buildFrontend:stage:es6 && npm run electron:build && electron-builder --linux snap && sudo snap install --dangerous .tmp/app-builds/superProductivity*.snap
scripts.preCheck: npm run lint && npm run test & npm run int:test && npm run e2e
scripts.release: npm run release.changelog && npm run dist
scripts.start: npm run electron:build && cross-env NODE_ENV=DEV electron .
scripts.startFrontend:prod: npm run env && ng serve --configuration production
scripts.startFrontend:stage: npm run env && ng serve --configuration stage
scripts.stats: ng build --configuration production --source-map --stats-json && npx esbuild-visualizer --metadata .tmp/angular-dist/stats.json && xdg-open stats.html
scripts.test: cross-env TZ='Europe/Berlin' ng test --watch=false && npm run test:tz:ci
scripts.test:tz:all: npm run test && npm run test:tz:la && npm run test:tz:tokyo && npm run test:tz:sydney && npm run test:tz:utc
scripts.test:date-utils:tz: npm run test:date-utils && cross-env TZ='America/Los_Angeles' npm run test:date-utils && cross-env TZ='Asia/Tokyo' npm run test:date-utils
scripts.version: npm run prebuild && npm run release.changelog && node ./tools/bump-android-version.js && git add -A
scripts.test:fast:watch: cross-env TZ='Europe/Berlin' NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' ng test --browsers ChromeHeadless --no-code-coverage --source-map=false
scripts.plugins:build: npm run vite-plugin:build && cd packages/plugin-dev && npm run build:all
scripts.plugins:build:silent: npm run vite-plugin:build && cd packages/plugin-dev && npm run build:all:silent
